topics.body:
"@Kaz":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552e90756368723207431700#post_552e90756368723207431700
[bq="Kaz"]And fapping helps headaches and other stuff too[/bq]
That is actually true.  If I'm not mistaken the reason behind it is that masturbation and sex increases blood flow which can help with a migraine or such.
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552e4fbb6368727b8dc51c00#post_552e4fbb6368727b8dc51c00
[bq="HJSDGCE"]This thread ain't dead yet.

You know, once I die, I want my own phrase to be on my tombstone. Not religious bullshit phrases or mumbo jumbo in languages I don't speak.

_"You can die? So that's something I didn't know about."
~ HJSDGCE_[/bq]
I would want:
"I told you guys to vote for the India map then I would have respawned and now I have to wait for the match to end."
